name: Hackathon.ChallengeSubmissionForm
description: Creates a form that can be used by users to submit a challenge
author: StatCan Digital Innovation

DisabledHtml.Html: [locale en]The challenge submission form is currently disabled.[/locale] [locale fr]Le formulaire de soumission de défi est présentement désactivé[/locale]

Template.Text:
<v-container >
  <v-card-text>
    <v-row justify="center">
      <v-col cols="8">
        <validation-provider name="{{ "nameLabel" | localize }}" rules="required" v-slot="{ errors, valid }">
          <v-text-field v-model="name" :success="valid" :error-messages="errors" filled="filled" label="{{ "nameLabel" | localize }}"></v-text-field>
        </validation-provider>
      </v-col>
      <v-col cols="8">
        <validation-provider name="{{ "shortDescriptionLabel" | localize }}" rules="required" v-slot="{ errors, valid }">
          <v-text-field v-model="shortDescription" :success="valid" :error-messages="errors" filled="filled" label="{{ "shortDescriptionLabel" | localize }}"></v-text-field>
        </validation-provider>
      </v-col>
      <v-col cols="8">
        <validation-provider name="{{ "descriptionLabel" | localize }}" rules="required" v-slot="{ errors, valid }">
       	  <v-textarea v-model="description" :success="valid" :error-messages="errors" counter="true" filled="filled" label="{{ "descriptionLabel" | localize }}" hint="{{ "descriptionHint" | localize }}" rows="5">
          </v-textarea>
    	</validation-provider>
      </v-col>
      <v-col cols="8">
        <v-alert type="success" v-if="form.successMessage">
          {% raw %}{{ form.successMessage }}{% endraw %}
        </v-alert>
        <v-alert type="error" v-if="form.serverValidationMessage">
          {% raw %}{{ form.serverValidationMessage[0] }}{% endraw %}
        </v-alert>
      </v-col>
      <v-col cols="8">
    	<v-btn type="submit" depressed block @click="formHandleSubmit" :disabled="form.submitting || form.submitSuccess">{{ "submitLabel" | localize }}</v-btn>
      </v-col>
    </v-row>
  </v-card-text>
</v-container>

LocalizedItems.Value: Votre défi a été envoyé avec succès!
Une erreure est survenue lors de la soumission. Veuillez nous contacter.
An error occurred during submission. Please contact us.
